entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Contains to OPENJSON translation generates invalid SQL: Sintax error near '$' #32468
  • Are ReaderExecuting and ReaderExecuted on the DbCommandInterceptor always guaranteed to be called on the same thread? #32465
  • Optimize translation of comparison of two nullables without both being null #32464
  • Allow Migrations assemble to be loaded from different assemblyLoadContexts #32461
  • Translated to uncorrelated NOT IN subquery instead of correlated NOT EXISTS #32459

Closed

  • Translating getters if they work in the main query already #32466
  • Is there an option to extend the model without inheriting from DbContext? #32462
  • EF8 Breaking Change: Annotation Removed (Minor) #32424
  • EF Core 7 + Oracle database = TPT inheritance doesn't work #32206
    9.0.0
  • Invalid SQL generated for grouped query followed by `OrderBy` in SQLite and SQL Server #32347
  • Client-side parameter transformations #28028
  • Support `Sum()` for `TimeSpan.Ticks` #27103

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Visit inside InlineQueryRootExpression in nav expansion #32467
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/8.0] Make ILazyLoader not IDisposable (#32345) #32463
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.x
  • Properly support LEAST/GREATEST over nullable value types #32458

Merged

  • Visit inside InlineQueryRootExpression in nav expansion #32460
  • Allow ignored key values for fixup before saving using TPT #32439

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Allow opting out of new subquery translation for Contains #32434
    Servicing-approved
  • Fix expression cloning when table changes in SelectExpression.VisitChildren #32456
  • Test new sqlite3mc SQLitePCLRaw bundle #32369
  • [release/8.0] Create correct JSON reader/writer for double nested value conversions #32448
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Allow empty inline collections (#32414) #32454
    Servicing-approved
